item.title: Releases!
item.description: wxPerl 0.76 has been released to CPAN, including four new wxWidgets controls. Alien::wxWidgets 0.32 released at the same time adds support for wxWidgets 2.8.4 and for bulding Mac OS X Universal binaries.

item.title: Mail list migrated
item.description: Thanks to the perl.org administrators, the wxPerl users mailing list is now hosted at perl.org.

item.title: Subversion
item.description: The wxPerl repository has been migrated to Subversion

item.title: Releases!
item.description: wxPerl 0.74 has been released to CPAN!

item.title: Releases!
item.description: wxPerl 0.66 has been released to CPAN!
